content.html: 6yo is at the stage where he finds great joy in saying incredibly inappropriate things. Yesterday we were sharing riddles: Me: What belongs to you, but other people use it more than you? 6yo: YOUR ANUS I'm still cry-laughing whenever I think about it.
content.value:
6yo is at the stage where he finds great joy in saying incredibly inappropriate things. Yesterday we were sharing riddles:

Me: What belongs to you, but other people use it more than you? 
6yo: YOUR ANUS

I'm still cry-laughing whenever I think about it.
